thread.title_full: NYPD's Hot Cop Samantha Sepulveda Loves Her Ugly Uniform (VIDEO)

author: TMZ Staff
title: NYPD's Hot Cop Samantha Sepulveda Loves Her Ugly Uniform (VIDEO)
text:
NYPD's Hot Cop Samantha Sepulveda Loves Her Ugly Uniform NYPD's Hot Cop My Uniform Makes Me Look Ugly ... I'm Cool with That 2/6/2017 4:15 PM PST EXCLUSIVE 
Samantha Sepulveda has to be NYC's hottest cop -- making busts by day, modeling by night -- but she prefers being an ugly Betty on the job ... and for good reason. 
We got Samantha Monday and she addressed some potential pitfalls she might run into while taking down bad guys -- and whether her looks help or hurt out on the streets. 
She has an interesting take on her NYPD blues ... and what the uniform does for female cops.
